items.sentence: I think it\'s dangerous for children to do that.
I honestly didn\'t think that Tom would be here.
I hope Tom doesn\'t tell Mary about what we did.
I did everything I could to help Tom find a job.
I want to find out what kind of music Tom likes.
I can play both tennis and baseball fairly well.
There is no proof that Tom committed that crime.
How much longer is Tom planning to stay with us?
How much time do you spend reading just for fun?
How often do you eat at an expensive restaurant?
I assume you\'ll be going to the dance with Tom.
Tom is looking for somebody to babysit his kids.
I\'m supposed to make sure Tom knows what to do.
I\'m supposed to meet Tom here in a few minutes.
I\'m sure Tom doesn\'t want to be in Boston now.
I\'m sure Tom won\'t want to go fishing with us.
Does anyone know if the cafeteria is still open?
I know you\'ll enjoy the food at Chuck\'s Diner.
I think it\'s time for you to tell me the truth.
I\'m going to allow Tom to do whatever he wants.
